text: The Cuba national under-17 football team represents Cuba in youth international football team. They have qualified for both the FIFA U-17 World Cup and the CONCACAF Under-17 Championship. ==Competitive record== ===FIFA U-16/17 World Cup record=== Year Round Position 1985 Did not enter Did not
